instr:
# **_Step 5_**
# Git add
    
   The command required to commit changes:
    
   ```bash
      git -C <directory> add *.txt
   ```
    
   > Additional commands
   > * ``mv`` renames files
   > * ``rm`` deletes files
   
   A task
   ==
   Make commit changes after renaming the Hello-Git.txt file to Hello.txt
   
   Hint
   ==
   ```bash
   mv tmp_git / Hello-Git.txt tmp_git / Hello.txt
   ```
